issue.message: Server URL should be absolute, and use variables for domain customization

repairs.action_taken: Changed server URL from '/api/v1' to 'https://{your-n8n-instance-domain}/api/v{api-version-number}' with variables definition.

issue.message: The current server URL uses a variable for the API version number (v{{api-version-number}}), but the request specifies that the API endpoint should explicitly be '/api/v1'.

repairs.action_taken: Updated the URL of the first server entry to hardcode the API version as 'v1', changing it from 'https://{{your-n8n-instance-domain}}/api/v{{api-version-number}}' to 'https://{{your-n8n-instance-domain}}/api/v1'.
